entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,807Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 380

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn’t even last a second, but that’s all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it’ll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn’t see it.He doesn’t feel it. A.K.A The reader’s soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she’s not his and she’s torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.summary:
Author: scleraphone

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,311Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 90

Summary: Somewhere along the line, someone had told you that if you worked hard and honest, you could make a difference in people's lives. You moved to Gotham after college to help where help was needed. You knew it was a city that took time to understand, like familiarizing yourself with the cycles of a tide. What you didn't expect was how quickly you'd be pulled into the undertow.

entry.title: Dedicated
entry.summary:
Author: writerclaire

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,079Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 54

Summary: You haven’t been happy in years, but being a successful author meant you had a roof over your head and food that wasn’t swiped from the trash. You were content. However, your peaceful hermit days are threatened when the hate mail becomes very real death threats and you are forced to accept a bodyguard. Jason Todd doesn’t have a lot to be thankful for. Absent dad, sick mom. Homelessness. Hunger. Then came a different shitty dad. Oh, and he died once, after he was tortured by an evil clown. Now he’s back and he’s ready to give the world back what it gave to him, but he is forced to rethink his priorities when he realizes that the one good thing he ever had is in danger.

entry.title: You're beautiful in my eyes
entry.summary:
Author: TheEndIsNeverTheEnd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,834Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Gotham is a city filled with crime, garbage, hatred, and murder. A clear class difference from the rich and poor, and the obvious hold angry men in costumes has over the city. Yet with everything wrong with it, there you are in love with it. You're a painter. (Not the smartest career choice) But its the thing that keeps you going in life. It's You're one true love. What inspired you to do crazy things.Like seriously crazy things.For example, inviting clayface to your studio to paint him.You swear You're not insane!!! ___ Title is a working name, I know it's kinda cringe. entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,210Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 117

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting.At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns.No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.

entry.title: A Blank Canvas Could Become a Paint-Stained Masterpiece
entry.summary:
Author: RiverOverHere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,161Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Jason knew that his soulmark was different from that of others. Where those around him had names tattooed on their wrists or timers ticking down until a fateful meeting occurred, Jason was stuck trying to decipher blobs and splotches covering his hands and arms, paint-like stains that infuriated him in their vagueness. This wasn’t like those who could write on their skin and have someone else write back. No. That would be too convenient for the life of someone like Jason Todd.AKAJason's side of my 'Paint-Stained Fingers' Soulmate AU

entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,814Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 118

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,615Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 52

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night.
